root.name: Call of Duty: Roads to Victory
root.description: OverviewCall of Duty: Roads to Victory is a PSP-exclusive entry into the Call of Duty franchise and developed by Foundation9's Amaze Entertainment. It follows the US, Canadian and British forces in various European Theater operations across 14 distinct levels. While the game was released as "Call of Duty 3" in Australia, it is a separate game entirely.GameplayReceptionExternal LInks

similar_games.game: Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex
